# Load Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(broom)
```

# Load data

```{r}
analysis_dat_aug_03 <- read.csv(here("data/03_dat_aug_03.csv"))
```

## Question:

-   **What genes are significantly up- or down-regulated between the patients with/without treatment?**

```{r}
# Filtrer data for genet CCNO
ccno_data <- analysis_dat_aug_03 |> 
  filter(name == "CCNO")

# Fit line√¶r model
ccno_model <- lm(mean_count ~ type, data = ccno_data)

# Se resultaterne af modellen
ccno_model |> 
  summary()

```
